description: A not-for-profit company wants to build a sauna large enough for at least 20 people.
title: Community sauna proposed for Inverness' Bellfield Park
title_page: Community sauna proposed for Inverness' Bellfield Park - BBC News
maintext:
A large sauna with capacity for at least 20 people has been proposed for an Inverness city centre park.
Community Sauna Highland said it would look at setting up a second site in another community if its plans for Bellfield Park were successful.
Sauna bathing is described as a form of therapy that takes place in a room usually heated by burning wood or electricity.
Community Sauna Highland has proposed building a large sauna, as well as an area where people can have a "cold plunge" and a space where bathers can rest.
